results.description:
Full Moon Healing Sanctuary October- with Special Guest Healer Doña Leova from Mexico & Bhakti Dojo

Come join us Tuesday Oct 27th for an exciting evening for healing & illumination! Let us warmly welcome Doña Leova, a Healer, Teacher and Community Leader from the Nahuatl Indian Tradition. She will guide us thru powerful rituals and techniques to deepen our awareness of the Healing Spirits in nature and further awaken our abilities to heal, protect, and bless ourselves and our loved ones. We are also honored to embrace Bhakti Dojo, a Brooklyn-based kirtan group hosted by Srikala (of Srikalogy) and Jesse Johnson. Together we will celebrate community under the beauty of the full moon.

The Full Moon in October gifts us the perfect opportunity to clarify our divine paths, to find the balance we need for the upcoming winter months, and work with our angels, spirit guides, and more!

Let us remove the layers that do not serve and let our spirits be happy and free!

Snacks to share…I will provide some delicious raw vegan chocolate.

No experience needed. All are welcome to join circle.

The program will include:
• Opening Ceremony
• Healing Shamanic Drum Journeying
• Wisdom sharing from healer Dona Leova
• High-vibrational kirtan by Bhakti Dojo
• Heart Opening Vegan Chocolate
• Community LOVE & more!

When: Tuesday October 27th 2015

Time: 8-10:00 pm

*Please be respectful and arrive on time as we will open ceremony promptly. Where: Jeanette Stoner Studio
83 Leonard Street 5th Floor
Tribeca NYC Cost: $25 or two for $40 if one brings a friend.

RSVP for one: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=QXECEBQLRZFCC

RSVP for two: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=DALALQZWDS8M8


Doña Leova is a Traditional Healer from the Nahuatl Indian nation of Puebla, Mexico. Her work is based in a cosmology of healing that is known as the "Tradition of the Grandmothers"..... named because historically, one grandmother would share the practice with one granddaughter who would then go on to become the next practitioner. Renowned and respected for the ancestral wisdom she carries, Doña openly shares ancient rituals, healing practices and Sacred Prayers from her community in the Mexican forests. In this workshop, she will guide us thru powerful rituals and techniques to deepen our awareness of the Healing Spirits in nature and further awaken our abilities to heal, purify, protect and Bless ourselves and our loved ones. Together we will dissolve limitations and welcome Joy. Please contact Robert Carris at [masked] for more information.

Bhakti Dojo is a Brooklyn-based kirtan group hosted by Srikala (of Srikalogy) and Jesse Johnson. We lead an open kirtan practice (Music and Mantra Meditation/Celebration) every Sunday afternoon at our home in Brooklyn, where we sing sacred sounds and share stories and poems from the ancient mystics. "Bhakti" is the sanskrit word for devotion, surrender and divine love. "Dojo" is a place for practice and discipline. Bhakti Dojo's mission is to spread the joys and blessings of sacred sound vibration by cultivating a community that supports the transformation that accompanies regular practice. We are storytellers and musicians, dancers and poets, teachers and servants, and we offer all this service in love. https://www.facebook.com/groups/bhaktidojo/

Sarah Eve is a culinary shaman, making magic in the kitchen and healing from the heart. She is a certified Usui Reiki master and practicing shaman with a deep love of the healing arts. Sarah Eve began her shamanic studies with Izhak Beery and followed with the late Ipupiara, a Makunaiman of the Ure-e-wau-wau Amazonian tribe. She has completed workshops with Tom Cowan and the 13 Indigenous Grandmothers. The path of healing also led her to work closely with the Santo Daime community, John of God, and crystal energy work in Brazil. Other international trips including Mexico and Central America, Europe, Israel, and Southeast Asia, she encountered sacred spiritual practices and healers in which she is blessed to share and teach. She completed her 200 & 500 hour yoga training with Sri Dharma Mittra. Integrating her experience also as a vegan chef, she uses food as another medicinal tool in achieving whole body health. She assists in creating a safe space in which you can heal you.
www.sarahevecardell.com


All text, images, and products presented are copyright. Copyright © 2015 Sarah Eve Cardell. All rights reserved.
results.name: Full Moon Healing Sanctuary- with Healer Doña Leova from Mexico & Bhakti Dojo

results.description:
Come and join us for an evening of fun and TurnOn. How often do we get an opportunity to be real with each other?


We play 3 communication game (you can play at whatever level feels comfortable to you). Imagine meeting new people in an environment where people felt comfortable to be themselves. That's what we have created.

It's a refreshing change from the typical networking or bar conversation.

You get the opportunity to examine yourself. Through other people putting quality attention on you, asking questions with genuine curiosity, and then listening - really listening – to your responses.

What comes up might surprise you!

At the end of the evening we will tell you all about how you can learn the practice of Orgasmic Meditation. What class you can take and what we have to offer so you can have the life that you want.

It's amazing how connected we can end up feeling - even in a room full of strangers - when we are willing to say what's real. In an hour and some you may even forget for a moment you are in New Jersey.

OneTaste is an organization teaches Orgasmic Meditation, otherwise known as OM. The games we play at TurnON are designed to create the visceral sensation of Orgasm/OM in your body, without having to actually do the practice (or remove any clothing!).

It's a friendly invitation to play and push your edges in a way that feels good. This allows you to stretch yourself and inspires self-discovery!

Come early, doors close at 8:10p.  

COST TO ATTEND IS $10.

For questions contact [masked] |[masked]


Can't make this one?  Visit us at www.turnonny.us 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8OWkv9zms4E
results.name: Fun communication games in Hoboken

We are storytellers and musicians, dancers and poets, teachers and servants, and we offer all this service in love. https://www.facebook.com/groups/bhaktidojo/

Sarah Eve is a culinary shaman, making magic in the kitchen and healing from the heart. She is a certified Usui Reiki master and practicing shaman with a deep love of the healing arts. Sarah Eve began her shamanic studies with Izhak Beery and followed with the late Ipupiara, a Makunaiman of the Ure-e-wau-wau Amazonian tribe. She has completed workshops with Tom Cowan and the 13 Indigenous Grandmothers. The path of healing also led her to work closely with the Santo Daime community, John of God, and crystal energy work in Brazil. Other international trips including Mexico and Central America, Europe, Israel, and Southeast Asia, she encountered sacred spiritual practices and healers in which she is blessed to share and teach. She completed her 200 & 500 hour yoga training with Sri Dharma Mittra. Integrating her experience also as a vegan chef, she uses food as another medicinal tool in achieving whole body health. She assists in creating a safe space in which you can heal you.
www.sarahevecardell.com

You know them, have probably read or seen them...those books or movies made for children that scare the heck out of them.  Those apple flinging trees in the Wizard of Oz.  Those creepy orange oompa loompas and their little evil songs.  What other "kid friendly" books or movies were nightmare inducing?

results.description:
Full Moon Healing Sanctuary October- with Special Guest Healer Doña Leova from Mexico & Bhakti Dojo!

Come join us Tuesday Oct 27th for an exciting evening for healing & illumination! Let us warmly welcome Doña Leova, a Healer, Teacher and Community Leader from the Nahuatl Indian Tradition. She will guide us thru powerful rituals and techniques to deepen our awareness of the Healing Spirits in nature and further awaken our abilities to heal, protect, and bless ourselves and our loved ones. We are also honored to embrace Bhakti Dojo, a Brooklyn-based kirtan group hosted by Srikala (of Srikalogy) and Jesse Johnson. Together we will celebrate community under the beauty of the full moon.

The Full Moon in October gifts us the perfect opportunity to clarify our divine paths, to find the balance we need for the upcoming winter months, and work with our angels, spirit guides, and more!

Let us remove the layers that do not serve and let our spirits be happy and free!

Snacks to share…I will provide some delicious raw vegan chocolate.

No experience needed. All are welcome to join circle.

The program will include:
• Opening Ceremony
• Healing Shamanic Drum Journeying
• Wisdom sharing from healer Dona Leova
• High-vibrational kirtan by Bhakti Dojo
• Heart Opening Vegan Chocolate
• Community LOVE & more!

When: Tuesday October 27th 2015

Time: 8-10:00 pm

*Please be respectful and arrive on time as we will open ceremony promptly. Where: Jeanette Stoner Studio
83 Leonard Street 5th Floor
Tribeca NYC Cost: $25 or two for $40 if one brings a friend.

RSVP for one: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=QXECEBQLRZFCC

RSVP for two: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=DALALQZWDS8M8


Doña Leova is a Traditional Healer from the Nahuatl Indian nation of Puebla, Mexico. Her work is based in a cosmology of healing that is known as the "Tradition of the Grandmothers"..... named because historically, one grandmother would share the practice with one granddaughter who would then go on to become the next practitioner. Renowned and respected for the ancestral wisdom she carries, Doña openly shares ancient rituals, healing practices and Sacred Prayers from her community in the Mexican forests. In this workshop, she will guide us thru powerful rituals and techniques to deepen our awareness of the Healing Spirits in nature and further awaken our abilities to heal, purify, protect and Bless ourselves and our loved ones. Together we will dissolve limitations and welcome Joy. Please contact Robert Carris at [masked] for more information.

Bhakti Dojo is a Brooklyn-based kirtan group hosted by Srikala (of Srikalogy) and Jesse Johnson. We lead an open kirtan practice (Music and Mantra Meditation/Celebration) every Sunday afternoon at our home in Brooklyn, where we sing sacred sounds and share stories and poems from the ancient mystics. "Bhakti" is the sanskrit word for devotion, surrender and divine love. "Dojo" is a place for practice and discipline. Bhakti Dojo's mission is to spread the joys and blessings of sacred sound vibration by cultivating a community that supports the transformation that accompanies regular practice. We are storytellers and musicians, dancers and poets, teachers and servants, and we offer all this service in love. https://www.facebook.com/groups/bhaktidojo/

results.description:
Bachata Class-


This is a fun, beginner level class that begins by introducing the basics of Bachata dancing!

The class warm-up will focus on footwork, turns, body movement and proper technique. We will work on proper frame and connection in order to build comfort with leading and following, all while learning a fun dance pattern for you to use on your next romantic night out!

No experience is needed, and no partner is necessary! 

Participation fee: $15 per person or $50 for 4-week session 

This is a weekly class that is regularly attended, the attendance shown for this event does not reflect the full attendance of the class, space is limited - Please RSVP if you would like to join us! 

Also, please feel free to contact us for information about receiving your first trial class for FREE! 

You can find more information about our classes and events by visiting our Web-site, Spirare Dance Studio.

You can also find us on Facebook, Spirare Dance.
results.how_to_find_us: The studio is located at the end of 41st Ave, off of Bell Blvd, between Donovan's Tavern and the municipal parking lot. Take the LIRR to the Bayside Stop or the Q13 Bus to Bell Blvd/42nd Ave. If driving, there is metered parking in the lot next door.
results.name: Beginner Bachata Class!

results.description:
EVERYONE IN THIS GROUP CAN GET FREE TICKETS to a great comedy show at one of the BEST comedy clubs in NYC!! 

Tickets are normally priced at $15 each!  You can get your FREE ticket by RSVPing w/ group and using the online link below - https://www.eventbrite.com/e/guest-list-free-admission-gotham-comedy-club-tues-1027-930pm-tickets-19021266119

The show is called "Comedy Juice" and features all professional comedians (no amateurs), who you've seen on: Comedy Central, Saturday Night Live, Chelsea Lately, MTV, Late Night TV (Letterman, Conan, etc), HBO, Showtime, & More! This show definitely features some of the BEST comedians in comedy! 

In the past 2 months, this show has had HUGE special guests including: Kevin Hart, Dave Attell, Jim Gaffigan, Judah Friedlander, & Louis CK!!

There's a great bar next door called Jake's Saloon that everyone can meet up at before the show, this is the easiest way to find & meet the group! Meet there by 9pm and go in all together!!  We'll have a few Meetup groups joining us. Ask for Meetup (Chris Millhouse) when you arrive at Jake's. 

The show is 18+ & Gotham Comedy Club has a 2 drink minimum per person (drinks don't have to be alcohol)

Hope to see you all at the show!

GET FREE TICKETS HERE - https://www.eventbrite.com/e/guest-list-free-admission-gotham-comedy-club-tues-1027-930pm-tickets-19021266119

results.description:
Futsal Pick up games (intermediate to advanced level)

Fee: $10 dollars per player per game; pay through paypal.

Only 10 players per game, no subs. One game is 55-60 minutes. Be early. Every player rotates as a Goalie for 6 minutes, time it with an electronic scoreboard. We play without a break. Regulation size goals with nets. Futsal ball. Please make sure to bring a white and a red t-shirt, indoor shoes. Games are competitive, but friendly. Please keep in mind that these games are definitely not for the beginners. 

No fouls, zero tolerance to this. “Futsal is not a physical but a technical game”. Minimum physical contact means fewer injuries and no violence. No charging, no displacing with your arms or body to gain the position on the ball. No running into the opponent. Play the ball, not the player. Time it, don’t foul it. 

Refunds: Cancel your RSVP 24 hours or more before the game and we will make the refund. No refund for late cancelations; no exceptions. 

Name of the school William J. O’Shea (100W): The school entrance is located on West 77th street between Columbus and Amsterdam avenues (pretty much in the middle of the block) on the south side of the street. You'll see a row of 5-6 metal doors. Open the door or ring the buzzer (on your right), Please wait and someone will open the door for you.  the court is on the second floor. 

For questions: Use the MEETUP message and notifications tools. 

Post pictures and videos at:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Futsalacrossamerica?ref=hl

Twitter: https://twitter.com/FutsalAcrossA

Thank you for being part of Futsal Across America.

Enjoy the game!

results.description:
Access the webinar here: https://www.innerengineering.com/online/free-meditation-webinars-2?signinsrc=Meetup-NewYork

***REGISTRATION closes 45 minutes prior to the webcast.***  Please make sure you sign-up on our website at least 45 mins prior to the webcast to receive your live log-in link via email. 


(Technical Support: <a>[masked]</a>) 


----------------------------------------------------------------

Isha Kriya Guided Meditation-

A lot of people find it really difficult to calm the mind and settle the body for meditation when they first try it. Too many people get frustrated and give up on meditation before they can experience its many benefits.


These 1-hour guided sessions offer a simple, but powerful kriya practice that aligns your mind, body, and inner-energies to easily and naturally become meditative. Once meditative, your experience of the life within you and the world around you becomes much deeper and richer. Daily activity becomes effortless and joyful.


You can easily learn this 12-to-18 minute Isha Kriya process in one session and practice on their own, or return to class to ask questions and deepen the experience with the group. Benefits of regular practice include improving health, energy and vitality; enhancing mental focus, memory and clarity; reducing stress and establishing a deep sense of peace and inner balance.

Isha Kriya is a gentle, seated practice, which can be practiced in a chair. No previous meditation experience is necessary.

The Isha Kriya process was developed by realized yogi, Sadhguru Vasudev. Sadhguru is renowned for his powerful yoga and meditation programs, as well as thriving humanitarian initiatives. He has been hosted to speak and offer meditations at numerous global leadership forums, businesses and universities, including the United Nations, the World Economic Forum, the British House of Lords, TED, MIT, and the World Peace Congress.

This free session will be facilitated by a trained Isha Kriya instructor. Contact: [masked],[masked] for more information about Isha USA or this session.

For more on Sadhguru and Isha, visit IshaUSA.org/blog
results.name: Isha Kriya Guided Meditation-FREE Class-(Online Webinar)

results.description:
Wake up. Work out. DONE!


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4KKltxVko4w

This is a core strength workout. We do boot camp style exercises, so think pushups, situps, planks, squats, burpees, etc. And there's a lot of high fives, smiles, and laughing involved, too...

Not sure how to do burpees? Pike jumps? Dragon Pushups? That's fine! We'll teach you. This is an awesome way to rock your body and get fit fast.


We welcome all fitness levels! Even if you have not worked out in years we want you to join us. Working out with fun, encouraging people in a group setting is better than trying to do this all on your own. EVERYBODY IS WELCOME!

Business owners, managers, and salespeople learn about each other's business and we share referrals. Now, more than ever, business people need to network to stay in business. BNI Business Developers provides a positive, supportive, and structured environment to share ideas, contacts, and business referrals.

To avoid conflict, BNI chapters are allowed to have only one professional per profession - which mean that each of our members represents a specific category of business, effectively locking out the competition. Check out to see if your profession is currently taken at the following link: http://www.bninewjersey.com/nj-newark-bni-business-developers-of-morristown/chapter_members.php


If you or someone you know are looking to increase your sales and your sales force, we have plenty of leads to give out. Email with questions or for more information.

You may have attended networking group meetings before, but you haven’t seen ours!  We are a growing chapter that maintains a unique sense of partnership as well as camaraderie. Come to a meeting where you will meet other local business people as well as have an opportunity to tell us about your business.


We meet every Wednesday 7 :15am at the Maywood Pancake House, our meeting begins 7:30am.

We are seeking all professions to join our group. However our group is very unique and attractive as it is one seat per profession. We currently have the following seats filled:

meta.description: Searches for recent and upcoming public events hosted by Meetup groups. Its search window  is the past one month through the next three months, and is subject to change. Open Events is optimized to search for current events by location, category, topic, or text, and only lists Meetups that have **3 or more RSVPs**. The number or results returned with each request is not guaranteed to be the same as the page size due to secondary filtering. If you're looking for a particular event or events within a particular group, use the standard [Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/events/) method.
